--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

Hope you are doing well,

 

Please be informed that we are opening Zimmermann Boutique that is going to trade in The Galleria Mall on 2nd August 2025.

 

We have prepared the Store Opening checklist for this store to ensure completion of all tasks. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time. 

 

A Microsoft meeting invitation will be sent shortly to discuss the opening preparations and the assigned tasks, please ensure you attend.

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach the designated Local Ops, Mohamed Bata; 050 8158 454 any time.

 

All the best, 

Retail Operations UAE

Subject: RSO UAE - STORE OPENING | (Zimmermann Boutique - The Galleria Sowwah Mall) 
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Hope you are doing well,

 

Please be informed that we are opening Zimmermann Boutique that is going to trade in The Galleria Mall on 2nd August 2025.

 

We have prepared the Store Opening checklist for this store to ensure completion of all tasks. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time. 

 

A Microsoft meeting invitation will be sent shortly to discuss the opening preparations and the assigned tasks, please ensure you attend.

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach the designated Local Ops, Mohamed Bata; 050 8158 454 any time.

 

All the best, 

Retail Operations UAE


--------------------------------------------------
